text: hi my name is jonas i encourage others
to believe they can make a difference
because anything is possible
when i was four years old my mom and my
aunt took me to la
to help feed the homeless and give them
clothing i saw the first homeless child
and seeing that just completely
broke my heart and i wanted to help out
every day after seeing that
i founded love in the mirror when i was
six years old it is a non-profit
organization that helps homelessness and
underprivileged youth
one of the main focuses with the
organization is to help inspire young
minds to give back
one person that has made a positive
impact on my life is my
old teacher maggie jonas has always
shown
humility through his first-hand
experiences and his actions
on how to help the community other
children began really embracing this
idea of
using your own voice of um feeling
inspired and taking action
love in the mirror hosts a lot of events
including our peanut butter and jelly
sandwich making event
our hygiene kit making event and our toy
giveaway because of cobia 19 a lot of
our events have been
cancelled or postponed but we collected
school supplies and we're going to put
together some kits and donate to
an organization called young horizons if
you have a passion for something
go for it one thing i hope everyone
knows is that giving your time is worth
more than any donation
being latino and having such a
supportive family has helped with my
efforts to give back
hi my name is jonas and i use my voice
to inspire others
